legal_basis: Sections 9 of the Crown Liability and Proceedings Act
application_details: Sergeant Duplessis suffered PTSD and alleges mistreatment by superiors
distinct injuries unrelated to his disorder, such as discrimination and loss of dignity
decision_reasoning: not plain and obvious that the statutory bars apply to all aspects of the claim
the pension does not compensate for all alleged injuries
procedure_followed: Rule 221(1) of the Federal Court Rules
result_of_case: motion to strike the claim is dismissed
